name: Mr. Dogless
description: Mr. Dogless is a game about a boy called Michael Dogless. His Dogo gets lost in the forest, where anything bad can happen... The woods are a dark place, where you can meet horrible spirits or hear scary sounds. Just imagine it. Heartbroken and alone in a dark place. You will do anything to find your loved one... but be careful - you also have a limit. Try to stay sane, or you will never see him again.
